rule.assert: Header must exist and be unique
rule.diagnostic: Header must exist and be unique

rule.assert: ByteOrder must be BIG_ENDIAN or LITTLE_ENDIAN
Tags must be in strict ascending order
Each IFD must have a Photometric Interpretation
Photometric Interpretation value must be between 0 and 10
StripOffsets tag must exist for stripped images
StripBYTECount tag must exist for stripped images
RowsPerStrip tag must exist for stripped images
Calculated and declared image sizes do not match
Missing required field for tiles TileOffsets
Missing required field for tiles TileWidth
Missing required field for tiles TileLength
Invalid Bits per Sample for Grayscale image
Invalid Bits per Sample for Pallete image
Color Map must be included in pallette-color images
Invalid Bits per Sample for Transparency Mask image
Invalid Samples per Pixel for Transparency Mask image
Bits per Sample must exist for CMYK image
Samples per Pixel must exist for CMYK image
Invalid Samples per Pixel for YCbCr image
Invalid Bits per Sample for YCbCr image
Invalid Bits per Sample for CIELab image
Invalid Samples per Pixel for RGB image
At least 1 tag must exist for each IFD
Image Length should be greater than 0
Image Width should be greater than 0
Resolution Unit possible values are 1, 2 and 3
X Resolution should be greater than 0
Y Resolution should be greater than 0
Planar configuration possible values are 1 and 2
Orientation possible values are between 1 and 8
Image must be in either Strips or Tiles
Image cannot be in both Strips and Tiles
String does not end with null
Cardinality of JPEGLosslessPredictors tag must match SamplesPerPixel value
Cardinality of JPEGPointTransforms tag must match SamplesPerPixel value
Cardinality of JPEGQTables tag must match SamplesPerPixel value
Cardinality of JPEGDCTables tag must match SamplesPerPixel value
Cardinality of JPEGACTables tag must match SamplesPerPixel value
Cardinality of WhiteLevel tag must match SamplesPerPixel value
Samples per Pixel and Bits per Sample count do not match
Cardinality of MinSampleValue tag must match SamplesPerPixel value
Cardinality of MaxSampleValue tag must match SamplesPerPixel value
Cardinality of SMinSampleValue tag must match SamplesPerPixel value
Cardinality of SMaxSampleValue tag must match SamplesPerPixel value
Cardinality of ImageBaseColor tag must match SamplesPerPixel value
Cardinality of SampleFormat tag must match SamplesPerPixel value
CMYKEquivalent count must be 4*Bits per Sample
Decode count must be 2*Bits per Sample
